headline: onsemi and Schaeffler Expand Collaboration with  New EliteSiC-based PHEV Platform
summary: Traction inverter solution will use onsemi’s next-generation EliteSiC to enable longer driving range and enhanced reliability for plug-in hybrid EVsSCOTTSDALE, Ariz., July 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- onsemi (Nasdaq: ON) today announced an expanded collaboration with leading motion technology company Schaeffler through a new design win that leverages onsemi’s next-generation EliteSiC product line of silicon carbide MOSFETs. The onsemi solution will power the Schaeffler traction inverter for a le
